overlayMapId.Wiki: The overlay map that contains this mission's specific MSB configuration. Represents the YY_ZZ parts in the following MSB template: mXX_YY_ZZ_AA

missionObjectiveTextId.Wiki: The mission objective to display for this mission.

baseMapId.Wiki: The base map that this mission takes place on.

unkSkyLighting.Wiki: Determines basic lighting used in map. Possibly refers to gparam by index.

missionType.Wiki: The type of mission this is.

missionAltType.Wiki: Determine whether to appear during initial playthrough or subsequent playthroughs.

missionBriefingMovieId.Wiki: ID of .bk2 video file to play for mission briefing.

currencyReward.Wiki: Amount of COAM given upon successful completion of the mission.

ammoCostMultiplier.Wiki: Multiplier to the cost of ammunition taken after mission completion.

ammoCostMax.Wiki: Cap to the cost of ammunition taken after mission completion.

damageCostMultiplier.Wiki: Multiplier to the cost of repair taken after mission completion.

damageCostMax.Wiki: Cap to the cost of repair taken after mission completion.

eventObjectiveMsgId0.Wiki: The objective text to display for event objective 1.

eventObjectiveMsgId1.Wiki: The objective text to display for event objective 2.

eventObjectiveMsgId2.Wiki: The objective text to display for event objective 3.

eventObjectiveMsgId3.Wiki: The objective text to display for event objective 4.

eventObjectiveMsgId4.Wiki: The objective text to display for event objective 5.

eventObjectiveMsgId5.Wiki: The objective text to display for event objective 6.

eventObjectiveMsgId6.Wiki: The objective text to display for event objective 7.

eventObjectiveMsgId7.Wiki: The objective text to display for event objective 8.

eventObjectiveMsgId8.Wiki: The objective text to display for event objective 9.

eventObjectiveMsgId9.Wiki: The objective text to display for event objective 10.

eventObjectiveReward0.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

eventObjectiveReward1.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

eventObjectiveReward2.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

eventObjectiveReward3.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

eventObjectiveReward4.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

eventObjectiveReward5.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

eventObjectiveReward6.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

eventObjectiveReward7.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

eventObjectiveReward8.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

eventObjectiveReward9.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

damageScoreMultiplier.Wiki: Multiplier to the score based on damage.

ammoScoreMultiplier.Wiki: Multiplier to the score based on ammunition consumption.

pointsScoreMultiplier.Wiki: Multiplier to the score based on points.

timeScoreMultiplier.Wiki: Multiplier to the score based on time.

timeScoreMin.Wiki: The time in seconds at which the time score multiplier is negated.

timeScoreMax.Wiki: The time in seconds at which the time score multiplier applied in full.

enemyObjectiveMsgId0.Wiki: The objective text to display for enemy objective 1.

enemyObjectiveMsgId1.Wiki: The objective text to display for enemy objective 2.

enemyObjectiveMsgId2.Wiki: The objective text to display for enemy objective 3.

enemyObjectiveMsgId3.Wiki: The objective text to display for enemy objective 4.

enemyObjectiveMsgId4.Wiki: The objective text to display for enemy objective 5.

enemyObjectiveMsgId5.Wiki: The objective text to display for enemy objective 6.

enemyObjectiveMsgId6.Wiki: The objective text to display for enemy objective 7.

enemyObjectiveMsgId7.Wiki: The objective text to display for enemy objective 8.

enemyObjectiveReward0.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

enemyObjectiveReward1.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.

enemyObjectiveReward2.Wiki: Determines the amount of score given upon objective completion.
